statements: SELECT * FROM sentiment_monitor WHERE message_id = 1;
SELECT message_text, sentiment_score FROM sentiment_monitor WHERE user_id = 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT message_id, message_text, user_id FROM sentiment_monitor WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT message_text FROM sentiment_monitor WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp <= '2022-01-31';
SELECT AVG(sentiment_score) AS avg_score FROM sentiment_monitor;
SELECT message_id, message_text, sentiment_score, timestamp, user_id FROM sentiment_monitor WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT message_id, message_text, sentiment_score FROM sentiment_monitor WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5 ORDER BY message_id;
SELECT * FROM sentiment_monitor WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT message_id, message_text FROM sentiment_monitor WHERE message_text LIKE '%happy%' AND sentiment_score >= 0.7 ORDER BY message_id DESC;
SELECT AVG(sentiment_score), MIN(sentiment_score), MAX(sentiment_score) FROM sentiment_monitor WHERE user_id = 456;
SELECT id, username, sentiment_score FROM forum_sentiments WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT message_text, sentiment_score FROM forum_sentiments WHERE username = 'Alice';
SELECT user_id, chatroom_name, sentiment_score FROM chatroom_sentiments WHERE sentiment_score < 0;
SELECT * FROM forum_sentiments WHERE id = 100;
SELECT message_content, sentiment_score FROM chatroom_sentiments WHERE user_id = 10 ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM forum_sentiments WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5
SELECT username, message_text FROM forum_sentiments WHERE username = 'John'
SELECT id, message_text FROM forum_sentiments WHERE message_text LIKE '%happy%' ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT chatroom_name, message_content FROM chatroom_sentiments WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT id, username, sentiment_score FROM forum_sentiments WHERE sentiment_score < 0.3 OR id > 100 ORDER BY id
SELECT * FROM forum_posts;
SELECT post_id, author, message, post_date FROM forum_posts WHERE author='Alice';
SELECT post_id, author, message, post_date FROM forum_posts WHERE post_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT author, COUNT(*) AS post_count FROM forum_posts GROUP BY author;
SELECT sender, message, message_date FROM chatroom_messages ORDER BY message_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM forum_posts WHERE post_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT author, message FROM forum_posts ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT message_id, sender, message FROM chatroom_messages WHERE message_date <= NOW();
SELECT post_id, author, message FROM forum_posts WHERE author LIKE 'John%' AND LENGTH(message) > 100;

SELECT forum_posts.post_id, forum_posts.author, chatroom_messages.sender, sentiment_analysis.sentiment_score FROM forum_posts JOIN chatroom_messages ON forum_posts.post_id = sentiment_analysis.post_id AND chatroom_messages.message_id = sentiment_analysis.message_id;
SELECT * FROM forum_messages;
SELECT message_id, message_text, sentiment_score FROM chatroom_messages ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC;
SELECT author_id, username FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT trend_name, trend_description FROM market_trends WHERE trend_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM forum_messages WHERE sentiment_score BETWEEN 0.5 AND 0.8;
SELECT * FROM forum_messages ORDER BY message_id DESC;
SELECT message_text, sentiment_score FROM chatroom_messages WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT author_id, message_text FROM forum_messages WHERE author_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT * FROM market_trends ORDER BY trend_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM ForumMessages;
SELECT message_text, user_id, timestamp FROM ChatMessages ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT forum_name, category FROM Forums WHERE forum_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM Users WHERE join_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT chatroom_name, capacity FROM Chatrooms WHERE capacity > 10 ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT * FROM ForumMessages WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT message_text, timestamp FROM ChatMessages ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT username, email, join_date FROM Users WHERE join_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT forum_name, category FROM Forums WHERE category = 'Tech';
SELECT chatroom_name, capacity FROM Chatrooms WHERE capacity >= 10 ORDER BY chatroom_name ASC;
